subject: From Desk Of Mr. Steven Jame
body:
From Desk Of Mr. Steven James
UBA House, 57 Marina, Lagos,State, Nigeria
Tel:(+234)0837 32 55 76----- Direct number
          For Your Payment Valued US$ 10.5 Million USD
Dear Sir,
It's my wish to inform you about the new development concerning your
approved ATM Cash Card payment of 10.5 Million United States
Dollars,The Board of Trustees and United Nation executives has
finalized with the Federal Ministry of Finance to process and release
the  Bank for Africa and the delivery will be carried out by Banker's
Courier Service.
Two days ago one Mr.Raymond Scow Kendel from Florida United States
sent to us a message stating that he was a family member of yours and
he made us to understood that you died last three years due to Corona
Virus pandemic that you have (willed) to him your approved funds when
you were still living battling with virus, So he said he (willed) all
his funds in the bank to him demanding the released as he is trying to
stand as your next of kin to you as inheritance but we are still
waiting to see if you will respond to this email within Seven bank
working days perhaps this will be the last notification to you.
The united Bank Board of Directors has warned us to be very careful in
our dealings with Mr.Raymond Scow Kendel and that was the very reason
we ignored any message from him but still waiting to see if you will
respond to this alert message for us to be sure that you are still
alive before we tell you the next line of action and the best way you
can received your approved funds without any further delay on it.But
at the same time your Loaded ATM CARD delivery fees is just $95
therefore your urgent respond will Determine if you will send the
delivery fees to enable us dispatch the Card to your address or we
should return to  Mr.Raymond Scow Kendel for the delivery of the Card.
You are advice to send the $95 through Ria money transfer on the
payment information below
RECEIVER'S NAME: IKECHUKWU NWACHUKWU
DESTINATION: LAGOS-NIGERIA
REFERENCE NUMBER :
SENDER'S NAME AND ADDRESS :
Once we receive the $95 we shall hand over the atm card to the courier
company for it delivery.
Awaiting for your urgent and immediate responses and Kindly respond on
time to enable us deliver your approved ATM Card without any further
delay.
Thank you,
Yours faithfully,
Mr.Steven James
UBA House, 57 Marina, Lagos,State, Nigeria
Tel(+234)0837 32 55 76----- Direct number

subject: Re:   From Desk Of Mr. Steven Jame
body:
Hello Mr. Steven James,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite surprising! I can assure you that I am very much alive and well, contrary to what this Scow Kendel person has been telling you.

I'm curious about this approved ATM Cash Card payment of Million United States. Could you please provide more details about it? How was it approved and why was it assigned to me?

Also, could you tell me more about the Banker's Courier Service? How does it work and how secure is it?

As for the delivery fees, could you clarify how much exactly I need to send? And why through Ria money transfer specifically?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert
